posts.purpose: Test creator profile sample posts display (CM-9)
posts.query_to_find_id: SELECT p.id, p.author_id, u.email, p.likes_count, p.comments_count FROM posts p JOIN users u ON p.author_id = u.id WHERE u.email = 'creator1@troodieapp.com' AND p.images IS NOT NULL AND array_length(p.images, 1) > 0 ORDER BY p.likes_count DESC LIMIT 3;
